extendedInfo.description: Feel the thrill of motorcycle racing like never before in âNight Rideâ, the FREE sci-fi racing game by Black Bunny Studio. If you enjoy Jetpack Joyride, Doodle Jump, or Tiny Wings, give 'Night Ride' a try.RIDE LIKE THE WINDCollect points, use exciting power-ups and try to last as long as you can, while speeding up the highway.LEVELS AND ACHIEVEMENTSLevel-up by unlocking achievements. Each level will increase your score multiplier and will make the game more challenging.CHALLENGE THE BESTDonât take your eyes off the road for a second, because youâll be riding against tough opponents on OpenFeint. Compare high scores and achievements.FEATURES- Sci-fi themed 3D game- Gorgeous graphics- Level up by unlocking achievements- Constantly increasing speed- Dynamic game difficulty- Open Feint leader-boards and achievementsABOUTThis indie game was created by my sister and I. We would love to fine-tune and polish the game as much as possible. Should you have any suggestions for âNight Rideâ, please do not hesitate to inform us. We plan to continue improving the game, and add new features to it.Graphics where inspired by the Tron light cycles.AD-FREECurrently, due to Google's payment limitations, I am unable to offer a full version for this game. In case enough interest exists, I will do all that is possible to bring you one. Please leave some feedback on Facebook if interested.CHANGE LOGVersion 1.1.0Thanks for all your support. Based on the feedback you provided, we are proud to release our first update for Night Ride. Since most people were unhappy with the tilt controls, we fine tuned them, and also added an alternate touch control system.Changes:- Improved memory management- Some ARMv6 support (not tested)- Improved tilt controls- Added touch controls as an alternativeCONTACTcontact@blackbunnystudio.comwww.blackbunnystudio.comhttp://twitter.com/blackbunnystudhttp://facebook.com/BlackBunnyStudio

reviews.title: Mr. Henry
reviews.comment: Would be a great game except it freezers during the play making hard to contract bike. Graphics are great though. Needs more work

reviews.title: Cool game, but little slow. Leggs a lot.
reviews.comment: This game is fun. Problem is that suddenly freezes here and there. Slow down during motion or suddenly accelerates. Some times controls moves and takes character right to desired direction when taping direction arrows and sometimes overtakes way too far or freezes and no response at all. Featured gun also does not fire when tapping screen. I have an LG Optimus 7. Please fix the bug.
